name: Paranormal Tales VR: The Outsider Exorcist
name_original: Paranormal Tales VR: The Outsider Exorcist
description:
Investigate An Assylum Where Everyone Has Disappeared.
Your Mission Is Simple, Recolect The  Cursed Items Around A Cursed Building Being Careful Of Whoever Hides From Your Sight.

***********************************************************************************

Please Keep In Mind This Is A Proof Of Concept With Basic Mechanics Implemented,

Feel Free To Give Feedback And Impressions Of The Gamefeel

                                                                  New Build Every Week
